DOC.brief_summary: Comparison Between Meperidine Drotaverine Regarding Effect Duration First Stage Labor Full Term Primigravidae
DOC.brief_title: Meperidine Versus Drotaverine Regarding Effect Duration First Stage Labor Full Term Primigravidae
DOC.detailed_description: Comparison Between Meperidine Drotaverine Regarding Effect Duration First Stage Labor Full Term Primigravidae Protocol Thesis Submitted partial fulfillment master degree Obstetrics & Gynecology The aim work compare evaluate efficacy drotaverine hydrochloride versus meperidine hydrochloride duration 1st stage labor .
DOC.criteria: ● primigravida . Singleton pregnancy . Term gestation i.e , 3841 week . Sure , reliable date document ultrasound 1st half pregnancy . Vertex presentation occipito anterior position . Efficient uterine contraction rate least 3 4 contraction every 10 minute , contraction last least 40 second . ● Abnormal presentation occipito posterior position . Multiple pregnancy . Cephalopelvic disproportion . Cervical surgery past history cervical injury . Patients antihypertensive therapy . Known hypersensitivity drotaverine meperidine . If spasmolytic agent use within 48 hour .
